LanguageData.Arachne_Armor.label: Arachne Battle Armor
LanguageData.Arachne_Armor.description: Traditional arachne battle armor made by pounding metallic material into armor shape. \n *Armor strength is based on material used.
LanguageData.Arachne_Armor_Helmet.label: Arachne Battle Helmet
LanguageData.Arachne_Armor_Helmet.description: Traditional arachne battle helmet made by pounding metallic material into armor shape. \n *Armor strength is based on material used.
LanguageData.Arachne_Power_Armor.label: Arachne Assassin Armor
LanguageData.Arachne_Power_Armor.description:
Arachne assassin's light powered armor. Armor covered in metallic material layered with plasteel-weave plates underneath are very effective at stopping attacks. Neuro-memetic assistors allows Arachne to wear the armor and still move easily.

Armor like this is often used by Arachne assassin.
 *Metallic material used does not affect armor stats. Decoration purpose only.
LanguageData.Arachne_Power_Helmet.label: Arachne Assassin Helmet
LanguageData.Arachne_Power_Helmet.description:
Arachne assassin's armored helmet, covered in metallic material layered with plasteel-weave plates underneath.

Armor like this is often used by Arachne assassin.
 *Metallic material used does not affect armor stats. Decoration purpose only.
LanguageData.Arachne_Shirt.label: a basic shirt
LanguageData.Arachne_Valkyrie.label: Arachne Valkyrie Armor
LanguageData.Arachne_Valkyrie.description: Traditional arachne battle armor made by pounding metallic material into armor shape. \n *Armor strength is based on material used.
LanguageData.Arachne_Valkyrie_Helmet.label: Arachne Valkyrie Helmet
LanguageData.Arachne_Valkyrie_Helmet.description: Traditional arachne battle helmet made by pounding metallic material into armor shape. \n *Armor strength is based on material used.
LanguageData.Arachne_Scout_Armor.label: Arachne Scout Armor
LanguageData.Arachne_Scout_Armor.description:
Arachne scout's light powered armor. Armor covered in metallic material layered with plasteel-weave plates underneath are very effective at stopping attacks. Neuro-memetic assistors allows Arachne to wear the armor and still move easily.

Armor like this is often used by Arachne assassin.
 *Metallic material used does not affect armor stats. Decoration purpose only.
LanguageData.Arachne_Scout_Helmet.label: Arachne Scout Helmet
LanguageData.Arachne_Scout_Helmet.description:
Arachne scout's armored helmet, covered in metallic material layered with plasteel-weave plates underneath.

Armor like this is often used by Arachne assassin.
 *Metallic material used does not affect armor stats. Decoration purpose only.
LanguageData.Leather_Arachne.label: arachne leather
LanguageData.Leather_Arachne.description: Tanned, dried, scraped human skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.
LanguageData.ArachnePninety_Bullet.label: SMG Bullet
LanguageData.ArachnePninety.label: Arachne SMG
LanguageData.ArachnePninety.description: Arachne's modified version of alien weapon they found centuries ago. Low damage with high accuracy at medium range.
LanguageData.ArachnePninety.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.ArachnePninety.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Arachne_Sword.label: Arachne Sword
LanguageData.Arachne_Sword.description: A traditional Arachne sword has excellent cutting capability
LanguageData.Arachne_Sword.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.Arachne_Sword.tools.1.label: edge
LanguageData.Arachne_Scythe.label: Arachne Scythe
LanguageData.Arachne_Scythe.description: A traditional Arachne scythe. Strong but heavy and slow melee weapon.
LanguageData.Arachne_Scythe.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.Arachne_Scythe.tools.1.label: edge
